_header: Mine own death and Christs and my wickedhead

CamEmm27.First Lines:
Myn oȝen deþ and cristes and mi wikedhedeDute of þe
                    dome and purgatories drede…
CamEmm27.Last Lines:
…þe grislih pine of helle and heueriche blisseIh
                    oȝte to bi þenche ilome bote misse
CamEmm27.Attributed Title:
Mors tua mors domini & c. vii cogitanda (f.
                    162va)
CamEmm27.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 28.
